 2006-04782006-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ND
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of LIEUTENANT-COLONEL JEAN-GUY PERRON, an officer of the Canadian Forces who is a barrister or advocate of at least ten years standing at the bar of the Province of Ontario, as a military judge, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years.
